title: Mia and the Awful Day
description: Mia is having a bad day! She hit her head, hurt her arm on a sharp, pointy nail, and scraped her knees. She fell out of a tree and off her bike. Could her day get any worse?Join Mia as she rhymes her way through an awful day.Mia and the Awful Day is a children's rhyming picture book. Beautifully illustrated in stunning colors, this book uses humor to broach the subject of having a bad day. Set in a picturesque Mexican village, this is a fantastic bed time story your kids will love.Available on Amazon as paperback or e-book from 19th October, 2015.Coming soon!Sign up for my newsletter to stay up to date about this book and others: http://wordpress.us11.list-manage.com...
author: Bron Whitley
